com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.lowlevel.pelionclouddevicemanagement.api

Interface EnrollmentDenialsApi


  • public interface EnrollmentDenialsApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<BlackListedDeviceData> getEnrollmentDenialAttempt(java.lang.String deviceEnrollmentDenialId)
      Query for a single device by ID Query for a single attempt to bootstrap with a blacklisted certificate by ID.
      retrofit2.Call<DenialAttemptsResponse> listEnrollmentDenialAttempts(java.lang.String trustedCertificateIdEq, java.lang.String endpointNameEq, java.lang.String after, java.lang.String order, java.lang.Integer limit)
      Return list of devices which were denied to bootstrap due to being subjected to blacklisting.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnrollmentDenialAttempt

        @GET(value="v3/device-enrollment-denials/{device_enrollment_denial_id}")
retrofit2.Call<BlackListedDeviceData> getEnrollmentDenialAttempt(@Path(value="device_enrollment_denial_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String deviceEnrollmentDenialId)
        Query for a single device by ID Query for a single attempt to bootstrap with a blacklisted certificate by ID. **Example usage:** ``` curl -X GET -H 'Authorization: Bearer <valid access token>' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/device-enrollment-denials/{device_enrollment_denial_id} ```
        Parameters:
        deviceEnrollmentDenialId - id of the recorded failed bootstrap attempt (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BlackListedDeviceData>

      • listEnrollmentDenialAttempts

        @GET(value="v3/device-enrollment-denials")
retrofit2.Call<DenialAttemptsResponse> listEnrollmentDenialAttempts(@Query(value="trusted_certificate_id__eq")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String trustedCertificateIdEq,
                                                                                                                @Query(value="endpoint_name__eq")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String endpointNameEq,
                                                                                                                @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer limit)
        Return list of devices which were denied to bootstrap due to being subjected to blacklisting. This produces a list of failed attempts to bootstrap using a particular certificate which is blacklisted (trusted_certificate). Returned list can be filtered by endpoint name. Trusted certificate ID filter is required. **Example usage:** ``` curl -X GET -H 'Authorization: Bearer <valid access token>' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/device-enrollment-denials?trusted_certificate_id__eq={cert-id}&endpoint_name__eq={endpoint_name} ```
        Parameters:
        trustedCertificateIdEq - filtering based on trusted certificate id (required)
        endpointNameEq - filtering based on endpoint name (optional)
        after - Optional parameter for pagination. Denied device ID. (optional)
        order - Optional parameter for pagination. (optional)
        limit - Optional parameter for pagination. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<DenialAttemptsResponse>
